description:
Things grow stranger for Law as he learns the secret behind why Corazon feigns being mute! But the mysterious Corazon`s actions are only beginning to baffle Law as he takes him on a journey to cure his White Lead Disease.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Rocky Road! Law and Corazon`s Journey of Life!
Ein steiniger Weg! – Laws und Corazóns Reise ums Überleben!
Kunan no Michi: Law to Corazon Inochi no Tabi
Un chemin ardu. Le périple de Law et Corazon
Трудный путь! Жизненное путешествие Ло и Коразона
苦難の道 ローとコラソン命の旅
